current_parameters.readonly_primary_panel: Tearsheet: Display subtabs in primary group will flush the leftnav to the footer buttons.

description.default: Select one or more input columns
Set checkpoint interval (>= 1) or disable checkpoint (-1). Ex) 10 means that the cache will get checkpointed every 10 iterations
Criterion used for information gain calculation (case-insensitive). Supported: "entropy" and "gini"

Maximum number of bins used for discretizing continuous features and for choosing how to split on features at each node. More bins give higher granularity. Must be >= 2 and >= number of categories in any categorical feature
Maximum depth of the tree (>= 0). Ex) depth 0 means 1 leaf node; depth 1 means 1 internal node + 2 leaf nodes
Minimum information gain for a split to be considered at a tree node
Minimum number of instances each child must have after split. If a split causes the left or right child to have fewer than minInstancesPerNode, the split will be discarded as invalid (>= 1)
Choose a data type with 'Single Checkbox' unchecked to show error.  Leave all data types unchecked to show warning.
Pick 'lion' to hide 'Pets'. Pick 'tiger' to show warning.
Enter your password.  Set blank to show error.
Enter your name to enable 'Expression'. Expression will be hidden if set to 'hide expression box'
Shared input list with below control
Use arrows to reorder the sorting priority
Complex table control with inline edit and subpanel edit
Complex table control list editor table input
Complex table control list editor table input
Change the type of columns in the active dataset
Expression box with place holder text
selectcolumns with parameter value set to 'age'
selectcolumns with parameter value set to 'age'
Required datefield with value set to '2018-5-11' with M-D-Y format
Datepicker with value of '2023-03-17T00:00:00' in m-d-Y format.

resources.columnSelectInputFieldList.label: Column Select Input columns
resources.columnSelectInputFieldList.desc: Select one or more input columns
resources.column_select_input_field_list_not_empty: Select one or more input fields. This is sample text to show how an error or warning message will display text if provided a long description
resources.numberfieldCheckpointInterval.label: Checkpoint Interval
resources.numberfieldCheckpointInterval.desc: Set checkpoint interval (>= 1) or disable checkpoint (-1). Ex) 10 means that the cache will get checkpointed every 10 iterations
resources.numberfieldImpurity.label: Impurity
resources.numberfieldImpurity.desc: Criterion used for information gain calculation (case-insensitive). Supported: "entropy" and "gini"
resources.numberfieldImpurity.gini.label: gini
resources.numberfieldImpurity.entropy.label: entropy
resources.numberfieldMaxBins.label: Maximum number of bins
resources.numberfieldMaxBins.desc: Maximum number of bins used for discretizing continuous features and for choosing how to split on features at each node. More bins give higher granularity. Must be >= 2 and >= number of categories in any categorical feature
resources.numberfieldMaxDepth.label: Maximum depth of the tree
resources.numberfieldMaxDepth.desc: Maximum depth of the tree (>= 0). Ex) depth 0 means 1 leaf node; depth 1 means 1 internal node + 2 leaf nodes
resources.numberfieldMinInfoGain.label: Minimum information gain
resources.numberfieldMinInfoGain.desc: Minimum information gain for a split to be considered at a tree node
resources.numberfieldMinInstancesPerNode.label: Minimum instances per node
resources.numberfieldMinInstancesPerNode.desc: Minimum number of instances each child must have after split. If a split causes the left or right child to have fewer than minInstancesPerNode, the split will be discarded as invalid (>= 1)
resources.numberfieldSeed.label: Seed
resources.numberfield_checkpoint_interval_not_vali: The checkpoint interval value must either be >= 1 or -1 to disable
resources.numberfield_max_bins_not_valid: Maximum number of bins must be >= 2 or Maximum depth cannot be empty
resources.numberfield_min_instances_per_node_not_v: The minimum instances per node value must be >= 1
resources.numberfield_min_info_gain_not_equals_min: info gain should not equal min instance
resources.numberfield_seed_not_valid: Field cannot be null. This is an example of a very long error message that someone might enter. The message text will wrap around to the next line as shown here.
